Omar Lizardo

I am the LeRoy Neiman Term Chair Professor of Sociology at the University of California, Los Angeles, former co-editor of American Sociological Review, current member of the Sociological Research Association and the Board of Reviewing Editors of the journal Science.

I study culture, cognition, networks, theory, consumption, institutions, and organization.

PhD in Sociology, University of Arizona, 2006.

BS in Psychology, Brooklyn College of the City University of New York, 1997.

Google Scholar Semantic Scholar 0000-0002-5405-3007

olizardo@soc.ucla.edu
